testcase.name: Logged User shall make successful order
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user login with "omarfadl000@gmail.com" and "omar123"...................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed When user enter "First Prize Pies" in search box............................passed And user click on product "First Prize Pies"................................passed And user click on add to cart button........................................passed Then product "First Prize Pies" shall be added to cart......................passed When click on agree on terms and checkout buttons...........................passed And logged user should fill Billing address field...........................passed And logged user should fill shipping method field...........................passed And logged user should fill payment method field............................passed And logged user should fill payment Info field..............................passed And logged user should place order..........................................passed Then order should be completed..............................................passed
